name: Bender/Helper Impact PR
overview:
Bender/Helper Impact (B/HI) is a leading independent public relations, digital marketing and marketing communications firm focused on technology, entertainment content, video games, consumer electronics and more. Founded in 1986, B/HI has handled communications programs for many of the largest media, entertainment and technology companies and properties in the world.

The Technology Practice works with start-up technology companies and products (B2B and consumer) as well as global brands to creatively and strategically build and expand their market share, as well as increase visibility to potential partners and investors.

Technology clients have included Sony Creative Software, Image Metrics, Channel M, SinglePoint, Zumbox, Streamy Awards, TV of Tomorrow Show, Spatial View, Dolby, THQ Wireless, amBX and others.

The Technology Practiceâ€™s specialty areas include interactive TV technologies, 3D (autostereoscopy), digital animation software, mobile advertising and applications, enterprise and consumer software, Web-based services, digital signage and content delivery networks.

Tactics include media relations, social media programs, tradeshows, special events, analyst relations, corporate communications, strategic messaging and more.
